attributes.additional_details: Now more than ever, with the cost of living rising, Ubers and taxi services are a blow to young people's bank accounts, knocking any remnants of savings for university out of the picture. If tube services were open 24 hours, this would be not only beneficial economically, but also environmentally, allowing young people to invest in TFL and also travel publicly to reduce their carbon emissions.
attributes.background: To allow tube services to run 24 hours, specifically the circle and district line as it encompasses a large portion of the south west of London.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of Transport for London, the Mayor of London and the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
